topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Deploying the Configuration Processor Patch

body.p: Before launching the HPE Helion OpenStack cloud (using the hcfgproc command), deploy the following patches to update required configuration files.

ol.li: Download the kcp-windriver-build-15-only.patch file, the knc-icinga-heat-ceilometer.patch file and the kcp-icinga-monitor-subservices.patch file. You should have downloaded these file in the prerequisites.
Copy the patch file to the ~/ directroy on the KVM Host.

Change to the kenobi-configuration-processor directory:
cd ~/kenobi-configuration-processor

Execute the following command to deploy the patch:
patch -p1 < ../kcp-windriver-build-15-only.patch patch -p1 < ../kcp-icinga-monitor-subservices.patch

Execute the following command to deploy the patch:
patch -p1 < ../knc-icinga-heat-ceilometer.patch

Execute the following command to integrate the patch into the installation environment:
cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build ./hlm_prepare-env.sh
When the hcfgproc command is executed, the updated configuration file will be used.

body.p: Return to the KVM + ESX installation.
